system.description:
When you choose this archetype at 1st-level, your archetype spells are selected from one of several lists, chosen from below. Your choice of archetype spell list affects other features from this archetype.

Table: Water Priest Spells

1 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6na38wnae58eief3]{Create or Destroy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.i4ejucvglhqpfm57]{Fog Cloud}
3 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.nz5w9m7a9pvxjw3i]{Acid Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.yav7747ibqje7nzm]{Alter Self}
5 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ug1c28d5upbq19x4]{Water Breathing}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.qmz47cw7wmy78gyc]{Water Walk} 
7 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.3xgx2cprxhoocscj]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.adbxdvi3uj851e70]{Freedom of Movement}
9 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.633bpp281x35cz6t]{Conjure Elemental} (water only), @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.f0lq2ogke9k8f1v9]{Mislead}
